page.title: 08WORSHIP, SOMERFORD AREA
page.content: The religious life of the area is centred upon two Church of England parish churches and two Methodist chapels. The Anglican churches are in Great and Little Somerford and the Methodist chapels are in Cleverton and Great Somerford,the latter just outside our study area. Though church attendance has lessened over the years,three of these churches still run Sunday Schools.The churches are also heavily involved in the life of the community. Before the State took responsibility for education the schools were provided by churches and our own school is a Church of England Aided School. On the next page we will be looking at the two Anglican Churches in more detail.
